programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge / Paddington Keeps Up With the Kamalis) S2 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge / Paddington Keeps Up With the Kamalis»It's the Windsor Gardens Pet show, Paddington is the judge but they're all so talented how can he choose? / Paddington Judy & Jonathan learn that playing with your neighbors is more fun than trying to outdo them even if Toq keeps copying their ideas!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddingtons huisdierhotel / Paddington gaat golfen) S2 (23/27)
programme.desc: «Paddingtons huisdierhotel / Paddington gaat golfen»Paddington opens Windsor Gardens' first ever pet hotel when he has Lucky to stay over. // Baaz has set up a mini golf course at the park, but is it really unbeatable like he says and how should you hold a club Paddington?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La caméra de papa) S1 (51/52)
programme.desc: «La caméra de papa»Daddy gets a new video camera. First, Peppa shows him how to work it, and then he records Peppa being silly.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La pièce de théâtre) S1 (52/52)
programme.desc: «La pièce de théâtre»Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vacances de Polly) S2 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Les vacances de Polly»Granny and Grandpa's pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le vent d'automne) S2 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Le vent d'automne»It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa's ball blows into the pond and George's hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le Spectacle de sons et lumières) S6 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Le Spectacle de sons et lumières»When giant robot Buster steals all the batteries that power Solar City, which runs on the sun's energy, it's up to Solar Power Workers Nonny and Goby to stop him and get the lights back on before the big light show is cancelled!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La crise de rire de Magenta) S3 (11/18)
programme.desc: «La crise de rire de Magenta»Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one "patient" seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Feelin' Filipino) S3 (18/18)
programme.desc: «Feelin' Filipino»Lola is missing her hometown in the Philippines, so Josh surprises her by bringing the Philippines to the house! We explore Filipino culture and family traditions as we play Blue's Clues.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Enchanted Melody / Chicken Abuelo) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «The Enchanted Melody / Chicken Abuelo»When Escarlata gets ahold of an enchanted guitar riff, all of the underseas may soon fall under her spell. // Tomás accidentally turns Abuelo into a chicken!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Tina's New Friend) S2 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Tina's New Friend»While trying to stop Bonnie Bones, Tina accidentally gets separated and makes a new friend in the form of an ancient robot!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Super requin) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Super requin»After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Shark Prank) S1 (23/28)
programme.desc: «Shark Prank»Shark Prank: Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master, Grandma Shark. (S1, ep 21a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Guacamole) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Guacamole»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le jour des élections / A la rescousse des trois signes) S7 (2/26)
programme.desc: «Le jour des élections / A la rescousse des trois signes»When Mayor Humdinger runs for Mayor of Adventure Bay, his Mayor Mobile runs out of control, the Paw Patrol have to save the day! // Ryder and the Pups visit Tracker and Carlos in the jungle, a group of monkeys find themselves in sticky trouble!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et les ballons) S1 (11/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et les ballons»A brand new version of a most familiar bear! A heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le pique-nique) S1 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Le pique-nique»Peppa and her family go for a picnic. Daddy Pig falls asleep after eating so much, but then gets some exercise being chased by a wasp!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les instruments de musique) S1 (16/52)
programme.desc: «Les instruments de musique»Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig find a box of instruments in the attic, and Peppa and George try them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grenouilles, vers et papillons) S1 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Grenouilles, vers et papillons»Peppa and George find frogs, worms and butterflies in Grandma Pig and Grandpa Pig's garden and they play with them.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Strawberries) S1 (1/78)
programme.desc: «Strawberries»Anna and Froga are excited to make the best strawberry pie ever with the first strawberries of the season. Anna makes a plan to distract Christopher while they make the pie!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Swing) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «The Swing»When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing!The two friends' search for the missing ropes turns out to be more difficult than they had imagined!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le Grand Joshini) S4 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Le Grand Joshini»Periwinkle is planning a magic show! The Amazing Joshini and YOU, are eager to perform the greatest magic trick the Blue's Clues house has ever seen! But which one? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat'Patrouille et le martien de l'antarctique / Un labyrinthe au milieu de la jungle) S7 (3/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille et le martien de l'antarctique / Un labyrinthe au milieu de la jungle»Travelling Travis is on another great adventure when he lands in Antarctica but believes he's actually on Mars. // Mr. Porter and Alex go on a sightseeing hike but get trapped inside a huge maze! The Paw Patrol has to find the maze and their friends!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pop pop boogie) S1 (7/48)
programme.desc: «Pop pop boogie»The PAW Patrol must work quickly to fix the tracks and remove a train car at the Adventure Bay Train Station, before the next train comes.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Kai Express / Ducknado) S1 (4/15)
programme.desc: «Kai Express / Ducknado»When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest! // Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Capitaine Métal / Grosse chaleur) S1 (15/20)
programme.desc: «Capitaine Métal / Grosse chaleur»Whilst some of the Deer Squad down with flu, Sir Steel tries to become a superhero with disastrous results. // Sir Steel "borrows" water from Crystal Lake for his Water Park in the city, but things soon go wrong!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog) S2 (24/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog»It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Ants on a Log) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Ants on a Log»Ants on a Log: Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear! (S1, ep 7a).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens) S1 (23/52)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Une aventure de facteur / Les Shark sous les projecteurs) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Une aventure de facteur / Les Shark sous les projecteurs»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (A Mail Whale Tale) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «A Mail Whale Tale»A Mail Whale Tale: Baby and William join the Mail Whale on a swim along and must deliver a package to the Postmaster General herself. (S1, ep 24a).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Quiet Game) S1 (n°76)
programme.desc: «The Quiet Game»After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Detectives) S1 (3/78)
programme.desc: «The Detectives»Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Smile Day) S1 (53/78)
programme.desc: «Smile Day»When Froga discovers that someone has scribbled a horrible frowny face one of her pumpkins in her garden, Anna and her are quite upset - especially since today is smile day!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (No Panic !) S1 (54/78)
programme.desc: «No Panic !»Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Ron's Sunburn) S1 (55/78)
programme.desc: «Ron's Sunburn»Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le portrait de Bubu) S1 (56/78)
programme.desc: «Le portrait de Bubu»Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a gift. She leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher discovers the abandoned painting.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les déguisements) S1 (18/52)
programme.desc: «Les déguisements»Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mama Pig and Papa Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les nouvelles chaussures) S1 (19/52)
programme.desc: «Les nouvelles chaussures»Peppa loses her shoes. She's getting new red shoes. She's so happy she doesn't want to take them off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête de l'école) S1 (20/52)
programme.desc: «La fête de l'école»Peppa and her family go to the street fair at school and do all kinds of things there. Peppa and her friends have their face painted like tigers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de maman Pig) S1 (21/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de maman Pig»It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La plus grande flaque de boue du monde) S3 (52/52)
programme.desc: «La plus grande flaque de boue du monde»Peppa and George wake up one morning to find that all the rain has made a flood, and their house is now a desert island!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Patata-Parc) S4 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Patata-Parc»Peppa and her family visit a new theme park: Potato City. There they discover that the magic of vegetables never ends. (Subtitled) (Audio Described) (Also in HD).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La nouvelle maison) S4 (2/52)
programme.desc: «La nouvelle maison»In this episode, Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see the home that he designed and Mr. Bull and his crew are building. They will help Mr. Bull and be surprised when they find out who their new neighbours are.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Kittens) S1 (37/52)
programme.desc: «The Kittens»Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Boris / Né pour être sauvage) S1 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Boris / Né pour être sauvage»The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home. The Barbapapa decide to bring him back to Africa. On the spot, they help Boris to acclimatize.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La grande couronne animale) S3 (15/20)
programme.desc: «La grande couronne animale»When the Great Animal Crown is lost at the bottom of the ocean, Blaze transforms into a super-fast shark to retrieve it for his Animal Island friends. But he'll have to swim fast - or Crusher may get to the crown first.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le pouvoir du recyclage) S5 (8/20)
programme.desc: «Le pouvoir du recyclage»When Axle City is visited by a littering raccoon, it's up to Blaze to save the day as a Super Recycling Truck! He cleans up the town and rescues his friends - just in time for a final showdown with the Litter Critter!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Un sauvetage bien imprudent / Le fantôme de la mare aux grenouilles) S6 (23/26)
programme.desc: «Un sauvetage bien imprudent / Le fantôme de la mare aux grenouilles»A spooky sound forces frogs from their home. The pups must bring them home and solve the mystery of the frog pond phantom.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le bus touristique / Une nuit au musée) S6 (26/26)
programme.desc: «Le bus touristique / Une nuit au musée»A fun museum sleepover is interrupted when Alex and the mini-patrol go missing, and Mayor Goodway gets stranded on a T-Rex!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Gravity Calamity / Ball of Chaos) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Gravity Calamity / Ball of Chaos»Sir Steel gets Professor Scratch to create an anti-gravity ray, which goes wrong in the hands of Ricardo! // Muffin's super bouncy ball threatens to wreck the annual Winter Festival! Kai learns to sacrifice something he loves for the greater good!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Fizzy Frenzy) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Fizzy Frenzy»Fizzy Frenzy: Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City! (S2, ep 2b).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge / Paddington Keeps Up With the Kamalis) S2 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge / Paddington Keeps Up With the Kamalis»It's the Windsor Gardens Pet show, Paddington is the judge but they're all so talented how can he choose? / Paddington Judy & Jonathan learn that playing with your neighbors is more fun than trying to outdo them even if Toq keeps copying their ideas!

programme.desc: «La caméra de papa»Daddy gets a new video camera. First, Peppa shows him how to work it, and then he records Peppa being silly.

programme.desc: «Le vent d'automne»It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa's ball blows into the pond and George's hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Tina's New Friend) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Tina's New Friend»Follow the adventures of 8-year-old Santiago Montes, a brave and kind-hearted pirate, and features a Spanish-language and Latino-Caribbean culture curriculum.

programme.desc: «Super requin»After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.desc: «Shark Prank»Shark Prank: Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master, Grandma Shark. (S1, ep 21a).

programme.desc: «Guacamole»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le jour des élections / A la rescousse des trois signes) S7 (2/26)
programme.desc: «Le jour des élections / A la rescousse des trois signes»When Mayor Humdinger runs for Mayor of Adventure Bay, his Mayor Mobile runs out of control, the Paw Patrol have to save the day! // Ryder and the Pups visit Tracker and Carlos in the jungle, a group of monkeys find themselves in sticky trouble!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et les ballons) S1 (11/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et les ballons»A brand new version of a most familiar bear! A heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le château aux 4 vents) S1 (27/52)
programme.desc: «Le château aux 4 vents»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Ma cousine Chloé) S1 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Ma cousine Chloé»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les crêpes) S1 (29/52)
programme.desc: «Les crêpes»Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Photo) S1 (5/78)
programme.desc: «The Photo»Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (We Love Nature) S1 (6/78)
programme.desc: «We Love Nature»Anna and her friends are planning an amazing picnic in nature. But Bubu's bag is too heavy, Christophe can't resist eating all the strawberries! (S1, ep 6).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet»Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure) S3 (12/18)
programme.desc: «Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure»Josh and Blue are having a playdate with our friend Rainbow Puppy, who makes everything extra exciting! We play a special game of Rainbow Puppy's Clues to figure out where she wants to go, leaping from skidoo to skidoo and looking for clues.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La mine d'or perdue / La maison connectée de l'oncle Otis) S7 (13/26)
programme.desc: «La mine d'or perdue / La maison connectée de l'oncle Otis»Uncle Otis takes a trip to a lost gold mine. After wandering off course, Ryder and the Pups must save him from the booby-trapped mine. // Uncle Otis's installs a Smart Home 3000, in his cabin, that ends up trapping Uncle Otis and Mr. Wingnut inside!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré»Rammy's tips about focus and meditation come in handy when Mister Staal's Replicator makes donuts rain in Midden Bos. When Kai takes out his Hydropower on an ice cream machine, it turns into an unhinged ice bot!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Numéro de voltige de Lola / Le Monstre des égouts) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Le Numéro de voltige de Lola / Le Monstre des égouts»Lola is worried her air display will not be impressive enough, but when Sir Steel joins, the air display goes wrong in a spectacular way! // When Sir Steel's dog Muffin's ball goes missing down the sewers, Bobbi has to face his fear of the dark.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football) S1 (4/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football»The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Mac and Cheese) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Mac and Cheese»Mac and Cheese: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! (S1, ep 8a).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen) S1 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen»Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés»Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue»It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Extreme Dodge Bubble) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Extreme Dodge Bubble»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Super Christophe) S1 (4/78)
programme.desc: «Super Christophe»Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Bicycle) S1 (9/78)
programme.desc: «The Bicycle»Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Magic Trick) S1 (57/78)
programme.desc: «The Magic Trick»Magic Trick: Anna and Christopher are amazed by Ron's magic trick! When Ron teaches Anna how to be a magician, she wants to make Christopher disappear! (S1, ep 57).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Go Find it!) S1 (n°58)
programme.desc: «Go Find it!»Go Find It!: Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, and the first team who does will win the game. (S1, ep 58).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Stay Over) S1 (n°59)
programme.desc: «The Stay Over»When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything to get him to stop, without disturbing his nap.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Snow Dream) S1 (n°60)
programme.desc: «Snow Dream»Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le lavage de la voiture) S1 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le lavage de la voiture»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le déjeuner) S1 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le déjeuner»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping) S1 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La princesse fatiguée) S1 (36/52)
programme.desc: «La princesse fatiguée»Papa Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a sleepy princess. In the story Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mama Pig is the queen and Papa Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le match de basket) S4 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Le match de basket»Peppa and her friends learn to play basketball, and their coach is Daddy Pig. He will teach them the rules- how to bounce the ball, tackling,... and in the end, they will play a game against a bigger, and older team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Dada-Cabriole) S4 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Dada-Cabriole»Peppa and George get a special package from their Aunt Dottie who lives far away, in another country. When Mr Zebra delivers it, Peppa and George will have to share the present and play with it together.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vilaine Tortue) S4 (6/52)
programme.desc: «Vilaine Tortue»Tiddles the Tortoise, Doctor Hamster's pet, has got stuck up a tree, again! Who can save him? (Subtitled) (Audio Described) (Also in HD).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner) S1 (23/52)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Fast Friends) S3 (16/20)
programme.desc: «Fast Friends»Blaze, AJ, and Gabby meet a brand new monster machine named Watts - a super fast truck with electric tires! But when one of her special tires goes rolling into the jungle, Blaze, AJ, and Gabby promise to help her get it back.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Semi-Remorque Blaze) S5 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Semi-Remorque Blaze»When a windstorm blows away the supplies for Stripes' Animal Party, Blaze transforms into the one Monster Machine strong enough to haul it all back - a Big Rig! There's nothing he can't pull with that Big Rig Force!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le robot-serveur détraqué / La Pat'Patrouille contre le tartouragan) S7 (5/26)
programme.desc: «Le robot-serveur détraqué / La Pat'Patrouille contre le tartouragan»Mr. Porter's high tech waiter robot helps around the café, but it can't stop cleaning! It's up to the Pups to clean up the mess all over town! // Mayor Humdinger creates a cyclone of delicious pies! The Pups must stop it before the town is covered.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les trois oiseaux / La course de caisse à savon) S7 (10/26)
programme.desc: «Les trois oiseaux / La course de caisse à savon»Myrna the Mynah bird leads her feathered friends astray and it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue the wayward flock. // Adventure Bay is holding a kids only soapbox derby race when a mysterious newcomer named ''Hum-Kid'' shows up and breaks the rules!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Petit mais fort / Puissance pomme de pin) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Petit mais fort / Puissance pomme de pin»Sir Steel wants to shrink the trees in the Central Forest to make way for his new tower. Deer Squad have to think small to stop him! // Lola and her souped-up Rocket Rabbit wake the residents of the Central Forest with all the engine's roars.
